head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Mastic: Injured Man Found Near Fire

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Mastic: Injured Man Found Near Fire

abstract.p: Injured man claiming he was assaulted is found by fire men called to fight van fire in Mastic, LI (S)

block.p: Police officers responding to a report of a van burning behind a laundry in Mastic early yesterday found a man with serious injuries near the vehicle, the Suffolk County police said. Police officers and firefighters responded to a report of a fire behind Laundry Experience on Montauk Highway on Long Island about 4:50 a.m., the police said. They found the man, who was not identified by the police, with severe burns. He told the police he had been assaulted, the police said. The man was taken to Stony Brook University Medical Center and was in critical condition.
